name: Wizards - Alpha
description:
A prophecy is read; in it it speaks of a person who will be able to destroy the greatest threat to mankind. You are that person.

Jump into a fully custom world in which you are trying to track down The Wizard. You meet a lot of people along the way and the story is completely customized depending on the choices you make!

The game is run on the RPGMakerVX.

Note:

- Game is still in early beta; maps and story is not fully ready
